item.description:
The Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers are back from their mini Upstate NY Tour and will be rocking the Great Chow in Abington Mass with some good old fashion Rockabilly (50's 60's Rock n Roll) The great chow is a great venue. Some of the best Chinese food around, big dance floor and lots of fun people.

So come on out and have some good ol fun... See you there. I am the organizer ( Boston live Music organizer not Community Organizer) Introduce yourself during the breaks and mention this meetup group and I will give you one of our just released cd's. See you there!!!!!
item.name: Juke Joint Rhythm Rocker's Wok'n And Roll'n at The Great Chow Abington
